attr.title: Sandtrix
attr.desc: Sandtrix is a retro falling sand puzzle game that puts a unique twist on Tetris-style gameplay: When blocks land, they dissolve into sand with realistic physics, filling spaces around them. To clear lines, you must connect the same color of sand from wall to wall across the screen, making it more challenging than traditional block-stacking games.
attr.inst:
Free Version (Itch.io):
- Download the game (Linux version) from https://mslivo.itch.io/sandtrix
- Place the tar.gz file in sandtrix/gamefiles/
- First startup can take a while, as files need to be extracted

Paid version / Demo Version (Steam):
- Purchase the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/2546310/Sandtrix/ (Or get the demo)
- Download the game and locate the folder with the game files
- Look for the .jar file and place it in sandtrix/gamefiles
